/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. Cars and motorcycles are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the busy nature of the area. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the blend of nature and urban development.
